title: Game of Love
description: Game of Love--A romantic novella set on beautiful MauiCallie Andersen never expected to be taking a solo honeymoon. But she just wants to lick her wounds after being jilted at the altar. Alex Harrigan, activities director for Harrigan's Cove, knows the best bandage for a broken heart is activity. And when Callie notes the lack of children's activities, he's happy to put her work gathering ideas. But when he starts to lose his heart, he wonders if he will soon be nursing his own wounds.
author: Denise Hunter
